actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 17 of the United States Code to allow nonprofit educational institutions to pay fees for certain performances without the actions of the institutions constituting infringements of copyright.

summary.text: Amends the Copyright Act of 1976 to permit nonprofit educational institutions to compensate specified performers or organizers without such action constituting an infringement of copyright.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 17 of the United States Code to allow nonprofit educational institutions to pay fees for certain performances without the actions of the institutions constituting infringements of copyright.
